markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Goblin Commando](/Monsters.aspx?ID=233)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The theoretical leaders of goblin raids are called goblin commandos. In practice, goblin commandos rarely continue to lead their comrades once a battle has begun. Most shirk their responsibilities in favor of wading into the fray and claiming more glory from their tribe-mates.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Goblin Commando](/Monsters.aspx?ID=233)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 180</row>

**Perception** +5; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +6, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 18

**Goblin Scuttle** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to the commando. **Effect** The goblin commando Steps.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horsechopper +8 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +8 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-55" />
name: Goblin Commando
